title: Help riot!
body: Help me! for some weird reason, when I play the new mode, when ingame, every 3 or so minutes it just comes up with attempting to reconnect... It does this for about a minute, then goes back to normal and does it again 3 minutes later... Now I know it's not my internet, because my ping is fine, and my internet doesn't disconnect when it happens, and I've played a normal game and it didn't happen... Plz riot, help me...

replies.body: Ok, Nevermind, just played normals and it is still doing it... Wtf riot
